title: Yatta Configuration
description: Configuration schema for [Yatta](https://github.com/yatta/yatta), on-demand video organizer application

onPlay.description: Application behavior when play button is pressed

autofocusNavigation.description: Auto focus on first item on a screen for easier keyboard navigation.

videoPlayCommand.description: Command executed when on Play button

videoListenCommand.description: Command executed when on Listen button

apiKey.description: YouTube Data API v3 API Key.

enablePublishDate.description: Show Publish Date on search result (might cost more quota).

enableWatchcount.description: Show Watch Count on search result (might cost more quota).

resultPerSearch.description: Numbers of results fetched every one API call.

infiniteScrollSearch.description: Enable infinite scroll on YouTube search (will cost more quota when enabled).

visualDensity.description: How large an UI element appears.

history.description: History and Saved Playlist related configuration.

pause.description: Pause history, not receiving any more new playback history.
